io.micronaut.validation.routes.rules

Interface RouteValidationRule

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MissingParameterRule, NullableParameterRule, RequestBeanParameterRule

    @Internal
public interface RouteValidationRule
    Describes a rule to validate a route.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    James Kleeh
